attributes.action: The Most Effective Way to Stop a No-Deal Brexit or Brexit
attributes.additional_details:
The only way to stop no-deal/Brexit is to vote with our own hard-earnt money. 

Let's boycott work. All of UK: walk out! Private sector and public sector. 

The only way the Johnson’s government will bend and act is only if millions affect the UK economy or withdraw tax revenue from it. 

I propose a meeting point at Parliament Square (London) at noon on Mon 2 Sep. Do not go to work until a back-down. 

Let’s act and stop this mindboggling self-inflicted harm on a nation and its people!
attributes.background:
If anyone thought affecting the Brexit outcome was as easy as signing a petition from the comfort of your home sipping from a cuppa – guess what. You thought wrong!

Remember the ‘stop Brexit’ petition (Feb 2019) with more than 6m signatures? What happened? Need I even say! NOTHING happened.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
